Recommended Modules

Recommended Modules

  • Dice So Nice: This module for Foundry VTT adds the ability to show a 3D dice simulation when a roll is made.
  • Quick Insert: A powerful tool for finding, controlling and inserting things in Foundry VTT.
  • Year Zero Engine Combat: A module that adds YZE combat mechanics to a game system!
  • Image Z00M: This module adds a button to image windows that allows you to see that image on its real size and zoom them!

Support

Support

We sincerely hope you have a flawless experience with this module, but if you have any issues or bugs, please reach out and we will do our best to get things fixed!

Please, contact us using one of the following contact options:

  • Free League: support@frialigan.se
  • Hod Publishing: support@hodpub.com
